definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
sentences.chinese: 他数点星宿的数目，一一称它的名。

sentences.english: Satan rose up against Israel and incited David to take a census of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 撒但起来攻击以色列人，激动大卫数点他们。

sentences.english: He telleth the number of the stars;
sentences.chinese: 他数点星宿的数目，一一称它的名。
小数点显然放错位置了。

sentences.english: And David numbered the people that were with him, and set captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds over them.
sentences.chinese: 大卫数点跟随他的人，立千夫长，百夫长率领他们。

sentences.english: And God was displeased with this thing; therefore he smote Israel.
sentences.chinese: 神不喜悦这数点百姓的事，便降灾给以色列人。

sentences.english: The difference is that the number mask allows for decimal points.
sentences.chinese: 不同之处在于，这里的数字掩码允许小数点。

sentences.english: Take out percent sign, move decimal points two places to the left.
sentences.chinese: 去掉百分号，小数点向左移动两位。

sentences.english: And Joab and the captains of the host went out from the presence of the king, to number the people of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 约押和众军长就从王面前出去，数点以色列的百姓。

sentences.english: For now thou numberest my steps: dost thou not watch over my sin?
sentences.chinese: 但如今你数点我的脚步，岂不窥察我的罪过吗。

sentences.english: Everything from the decimal point over gets chopped off.
sentences.chinese: 所有小数点后面的数值都被砍掉了。

sentences.english: As the ship advanced through the water the knots were counted as they passed through a seaman's hands.
sentences.chinese: 当船先进通过水结数点他们穿过一个海员的手中。

sentences.english: So at that time King Joram set out from Samaria and mobilized all Israel.
sentences.chinese: 那时约兰王出撒马利亚，数点以色列众人。

sentences.english: That means paying too much attention to the numbers after the decimal point doesn't make sense.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着过多关注小数点后面的数字没有多大意义。

sentences.english: Something with a decimal point and numbers thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 也就是小数点后还有数字。

sentences.english: This functions finds minimum distance loop between no. of points using the distance formula.
sentences.chinese: 这一职能认为最小距离环数点之间的距离公式使用。

definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian jackdaw (Coloeus monedula)
(literary) crisscross/uneven/disorderly/rim of the eye/variant of 欄杆|栏杆[lan2 gan1]
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
drop of melted wax that runs down the side of a candle
